summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Juneau Street from Beacon Avenue to a point 250 feet east of 25th Avenue South; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; in accordance with Resolution No. 9513 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of " Payment in Bonds".
